channel.title: Matrix Shops fix?
channel.description:
Is there a matrix shops fix out there? I have fixed everything in the matrix source and changed the shops and everything but the shops don't work. Does anyone know to fix?
Skype:Tim3626719

item.title: Matrix Shops fix?
item.dc:creator: @hur911 hur911
item.description:
@hur911 wrote:

Of course, but I meant whenever I try to buy something in one of the shops, the process does not go through and you cannot buy anything. I know it is related to buttonhandler.java, shop.java, and worldpacketsdecoder.java. I have a problem with the shop.java.

Read full topic
